entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He touched the Triwizard Cup and witnessed Lord Voldemort's rebirth.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who explains things to others. He is prepared to take Harry's word on this.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the one whose rebirth Harry witnessed.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius breaks the silence in the story.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a person who has a curious smile and questions Dumbledore.

entities.name: triwizard cup
entities.description: The Triwizard Cup is an object that Harry touched, leading to him witnessing Voldemort's rebirth.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is the one whose rebirth Harry witnessed.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is prepared to take Harry's word on this.
Fudge questions Dumbledore about taking Harry's word.
